h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: The Falcon man can also use a slow two-handed overhand swing in melee range, or at a distance to create giant tornadoes hurtling your way.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Upper Pagoda (Level 4)'.
The content is as follows:
The Falcon man can also use a slow two-handed overhand swing in melee range, or at a distance to create giant tornadoes hurtling your way.
